project_abstract.cdata: The project is being executed by the Highway Department in the Ministry of Public Works. The final designs and contract documents have been prepared by engineering consultants. Consultants will also continue to supervise construction. The Highway Department is well qualified and with the help of consultants should be able to complete the project satisfactorily. The project consists of the improvement, construction or reconstruction of seven trunk roads, two to upgraded standards, and four feeder roads.

P007145.docty: Project Performance Assessment Report,Loan Agreement,Staff Appraisal Report
